text: Upon deplyment of a new WAR overriting an old WAR, Tomcat should refresh the deployment directories, updating newer files, adding the new files and deleting the removed files from the new WAR.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text: Will probably be resolved for 3.3 ( not difficult )

text: Done for 3.3, you need to specify redeploy="true"  on <AutoDeploy >.
